title: This map shows the latest state of control in Ukraine
Friend says she was shocked to see this girl speaking at Putin's rally
description: CNN's Melissa Bell speaks to people who knew Anya Naumenko, a 13-year-old Ukrainian child brought to Russia from Mariupol, after seeing her speak at a rally in Moscow celebrating the Russian army.

title: Jake Gyllenhaal shows off ripped physique during weigh-in appearance at UFC 285
description: Hollywood star Jake Gyllenhaal made a surprise appearance at UFC 285 in Las Vegas, Nevada on Friday.

title: Russia's Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu makes rare visit to frontline troops
description: Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu has paid a rare visit to Russian troops serving in occupied Ukraine -- a visit that's probably as much about optics as about the course of Russia's invasion.

title: Human brain-powered computers could be the way of the future
description: The human brain is unrivaled in its capacity to process information.

title: 'I feel like a stronger version of myself:' Jon Jones set for UFC return after body transformation
description: Considered by many as the greatest MMA fighter in history, Jon Jones will return to the Octagon on Saturday for the first time in three years; albeit with a different look.

title: Holy oil to anoint King Charles III on his coronation, has been consecrated in Jerusalem
description: The sacred oil that will be used to anoint King Charles III at his coronation May 6, has been consecrated at a Christian holy site in Jerusalem, Buckingham Palace has announced.

title: Rafael Viñoly, architect who designed 'The Walkie-Talkie' building, dies aged 78
description: Rafael Viñoly, the Uruguayan-born architect who designed 20 Fenchurch Street in London, nicknamed "The Walkie-Talkie," has died, his firm says. He was 78.

title: Trump asks court to block Pence's grand jury testimony in 2020 election interference probe
description: Former President Donald Trump has asked a federal court to block former Vice President Mike Pence from speaking to a grand jury about certain matters covered by executive privilege as part of the criminal investigation into efforts to overturn Trump's 2020 election loss, sources familiar with the move told CNN.

title: Chris Rock is set to make Netflix history
description: Get ready for Chris Rock to make history.

title: Woman missing more than 30 years and thought to be dead found living in Puerto Rico nursing home
description: A Pennsylvania woman who disappeared more than 30 years ago and was believed to be dead by her family was recently found living in a nursing home in Puerto Rico, her family and police said at a news conference Thursday.

title: Michael B. Jordan reminds us of a valuable lesson about kindness
description: How does the saying go: Be nice to the people you meet on the way up, because they're the same people you might meet on the way down?

title: Why Trump is a clear favorite for the 2024 GOP nomination
description: Conservatives across the nation are in the Washington, DC, area this weekend for the annual Conservative Political Action Conference.

title: How Paul Murdaugh helped solve his own murder
description: For a year and a half, Alex Murdaugh denied he was anywhere near where his wife, Maggie, and 22-year-old son, Paul, were brutally killed.

title: UK intelligence says Russian forces are further advancing into the eastern city, amid signs months of bloody fighting could be reaching a climax
Ukrainian army under 'severe pressure' in Bakhmut, UK defense ministry says
Do not 'push a slower friend down' if you encounter a bear, National Park Service warns
description: The National Park Service has some bear-y important tips for what not to do if you -- and a friend -- encounter a bear in the wild.

title: American teenage speed skating sensation Jordan Stolz becomes youngest ever world champion
description: Jordan Stolz won the men's 500m event at the 2023 ISU World Speed Skating Championships in Heerenveen, the Netherlands on Friday to become the youngest ever single distance world champion.

title: Despite toxic disaster, US railroads still want single-person crews
description: The nation's major freight railroads have long desired to have only one crew member, a lone engineer, in the cab of their locomotives. And that desire hasn't changed despite the derailment of a Norfolk Southern train on February 3 that released toxic chemicals into the air, water and soil of East Palestine, Ohio, that is still being cleaned up.

title: Their houses were destroyed in the war. Now boxer Oleksandr Usyk is helping Ukrainian families move back home
description: Diana Savenok smiles when she recalls what life was like in Ukraine before Russia's invasion just over a year ago.

title: Disneyland's record-breaking regular shares his wisdom from nearly 3,000 park visits in a row
description: There are Disney Park regulars, and then there's Jeff Reitz. The 50-year-old California native visited Disneyland every day for 2,995 days between 2012 and March 2020, earning him a shiny new Guinness World Record for most consecutive trips to the theme park.

title: Barcelona sign Ronaldinho's 18-year-old son João Mendes after successful trial
description: Barcelona has announced the signing of 18-year-old João Mendes, who is the son of former club legend Ronaldinho.

title: International drug bust nets $677 million of cocaine bound for Australia
description: A joint US and Australian law enforcement operation busted an international drug ring after intercepting 2.4 tons of cocaine aboard a vessel off the coast of South America that had been bound for Australia.

title: Europe will start charging for entry in 2024
description: This week in travel news: The European Commission will start charging for a new visa waiver scheme next year, plus our pick of Croatian and Italian destinations and new Asian hotels.

title: In Ukraine, Battle for Bakhmut Traps Civilians
description: Melissa Bell reports on the fate of civilians amid Russia's attempt to capture Bakhmut.

title: After tracking down the 'ketchup boat guy,' Heinz is ready to give him a new boat
description: After enlisting the public's help to find Elvis Francois, a sailor who survived weeks lost at sea off of ketchup and seasonings, ketchup giant Heinz has finally tracked him down -- and plans to gift him a new boat.

title: Apple supplier Foxconn is on the hunt for semiconductor and EV deals in India
description: Apple supplier Foxconn says it is seeking Indian partners to cooperate in areas such as chips and electric vehicles, as its chief executive wrapped up a visit to the country.

title: Colombia plans to send 70 'cocaine hippos' to India and Mexico, governor says
description: Colombia plans to fly dozens of its "cocaine hippos" -- the descendents of drug trafficker Pablo Escobar's private menagerie -- to new homes in India and Mexico in a bid to control their booming population, according to the local governor.

title: The World's Ugliest Dog Contest is officially accepting entries for its 2023 competition
description: Calling all unsightly (but no less lovable) pups: The World's Ugliest Dog Contest is once again open for submissions.

title: A colonial explorer stole Aboriginal spears in 1770. Centuries later, they'll finally return to Australia
description: Four Aboriginal spears taken by British explorer James Cook in 1770, thought to be some of the oldest surviving artifacts collected by any European from Australia, will be repatriated to the La Perouse Aboriginal community, Cambridge University announced.

title: Why the American far right adopted Brazilian ex-President Jair Bolsonaro
description: This Saturday, as American conservatives flock to the Conservative Political Action Conference in Maryland, they'll get a taste of just how far and wide their own ideas have spread. Former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro will speak on the same stage where a few hours later former US leader Donald Trump will deliver the event's closing remarks — a man the Brazilian leader has intentionally mirrored from the beginning of his presidency.

title: Tom Sizemore, 'Saving Private Ryan' star, dead at 61
description: Tom Sizemore, an actor known for his work in hit films like "Saving Private Ryan," "Natural Born Killers" and "Heat," has died, his representative Charles Lago confirmed to CNN on Friday.

title: Video shows critical bridge destroyed by Russia
description: New video shows the aftermath of fighting near Bakhmut, Ukraine, where a critical supply line for Ukrainian forces has come under attack. CNN's Alex Marquardt reports.

title: 'We will not stop fighting': Daughter of imprisoned Putin critic Navalny speaks out
description:
• Live: China still considering giving lethal aid to Russia, White House says
• Video: See why a crowd laughed at a top Russian official

title: Fire at Indonesian fuel storage station kills at least 16
description: At least 16 people were killed in a fire at a fuel storage station in the Indonesian capital of Jakarta, CNN affiliate CNN Indonesia reported on Friday.

title: See why Jim Jordan's FBI whistleblowers are facing growing scrutiny
description: House Judiciary Chairman Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) is on a mission to prove the FBI and DOJ have "weaponized" conservatives, but Democrats are raising questions about the legitimacy of Jordan's whistleblowers central to his case.

title: Bannon has a harsh message for Fox News at CPAC
description: During his 2023 CPAC speech, former Trump adviser Steve Bannon slammed Rupert Murdoch and Fox News for 'disrespecting' former President Donald Trump.

title: A string of gruesome cat killings has this Japanese city on edge
description: The first grim discovery came when a woman found the severed head and paws of a brown speckled cat as she walked along the banks of the Arakawa River in Saitama City, Japan. Days later, what police believe was the rest of the body turned up on the grounds of an elementary school.

title: Anxiety still looms over East Palestine one month after train derailment
description: One month following the train derailment and subsequent chemical spill, residents of East Palestine and the surrounding region are still anxious about the long term effects for themselves, their families, and their businesses. CNN's Miguel Marquez reports.

title: Listen to who Republicans at CPAC are most excited to see
description: CPAC attendees struggle with the potential feud between former President Trump and Florida Governor Ron DeSantis.
